title: Perform Medical Coding of an Adverse Event
description: A drug safety physician must perform the medical assessment and coding for a complex adverse event case.

tasks.description: Review the source documents and narrative for a serious adverse event case.
Write a medical narrative summarizing the case in a standard format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear, concise, and medically accurate narrative.

tasks.description: Code the reported events and diagnoses using the MedDRA dictionary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately codes all medical concepts in the case to the appropriate MedDRA terms.

tasks.description: Perform a causality assessment to determine the likelihood that the drug caused the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assesses the relationship as 'possibly related' and documents the justification.
